item.title: Cut the hedges on the corner couple of hous eand bear 139 Chatsworth rd, 17th November
item.description:
This hedges overelgrown on thr pavement. Outside on the corner of Lydford Rd and chatsworth Rd. ND NEAR 139 CHATSWORTH RD. There's hardly at some point only one meter to walk and hard to walk in the 3evening from here. The hedge over 3 foot overgrown on the pavement. We cannot walk or use or disable wheelchairs. If any dog coming thr other person cannot pass either. It's obstruction on main pavement n need more clear road for walk.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumoed, 17th November
